property.title: Tropical Haven | Center | Kitchen | AC | WiFi | TV
property.description:
In the heart of Madrid, just steps walking from the Royal Palace and Gran V√≠a, this cozy retreat in a safe, elegant neighborhood features a tropical-themed bedroom, a spa-like black-tiled bathroom, and a fully equipped kitchenette with all the essentials. Other things to note
We would be delighted to host you! To ensure a pleasant stay for all our guests, please keep the following in mind before booking:

¬∑ Self check-in with a security code ‚Äì no keys are needed. You will receive the code before your arrival.

¬∑ No parties or events are allowed.

We appreciate your cooperation in helping us provide a comfortable and enjoyable stay for everyone.
